LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE.title: Support dark mode in the app
LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE.description: Users have requested a dark theme option. Should remember their preference across sessions. Low priority but would be nice to have.

title: feature/dark-mode-toggle
author: frontend-dev
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #206 - feature/dark-mode-toggle
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/206
Status: open
Author: frontend-dev

Description:
Adds ability for users to switch between light and dark themes. Persists preference in localStorage.

Changes:
- Added ThemeContext provider
- Created useTheme hook
- Added toggle button in settings
- CSS variables for theme colors
- Saves preference to localStorage

Screenshots:
[Light mode screenshot]
[Dark mode screenshot]

Testing:
- Tested in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
- Verified preference persists after refresh
- Checked accessibility contrast ratios

Activity:

2025-01-25 10:00:00 frontend-dev opened pull request
2025-01-25 11:00:00 design-team requested changes: adjust contrast ratios
2025-01-25 14:00:00 frontend-dev pushed fixes
